page.title: 03EMPLOYERS REIGATE/REDHILL
page.content: The{range of firms}in the area is large. Many of them are associated with modern technology. The{largest employer}continues to be {Redlands}with a work force of about 7 000. Other notable firms include Distiller's, Industrial Newspapers, London Country Bus Services, Foxboro- Yoxall, Crusader Insurance & the Civil Aviation Authority. Some of these are outside the block but employ many who live within it. - The Holmethorpe Industrial Estate, where there is much {light industry}is east of the A23 in Redhill. Many continue to work in{London. Others{travel south}to Salfords (where Monotype & Philips Research Labora- tories have premises), to Gatwick airport & Crawley. In l98l,about half of the working population residing in the Borough worked outside the area.
